name: Archer's Wall (HarpiaGamesStudio)
description:
Create strategies, defend villages and become the greatest hero of all time

The first 5000 players will receive an in-game gift! Download it now!

Controls:

Use A or D to rotate the camera.

Use mouse scroll to zoom

Placing troops:

Click on the hammer  to  enter the builld mode

Choose   where you want to  place your troop

Choose your troop

Click BUY:

Pro tip:   You can upgrade  or sell your troops

Please  check the android version if you had fun! 

Game features:

- No boring tutorials!

- Towers, cannons, ballistas and more!

- Simple and easy to play!

- Multiple real time soldiers attacking! 

- Multiple strategies!

- 2 game modes! 

- Fully interactive camera! Adds film like action to your battle! 

- Amazing and optimized graphics!

- Offline game.
